attributes.action: We count the pennies while the Labour Government is flash with our Cash for 10 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs Expenses should be slashed now, as they are costing the public to much money and not value for money and why should we pay them up to £25,000 a year on top of there wages and gold plated pensions and Fuel cost.
If they would receive an expense it should be £5,000 every year for five years and if they leave as an MP the items should be sold and given back to the state and why should we pay for there food bills, Sky TV and TV's and more.
This Labour Government has been flash with our cash for 10 years.
They should stand down and we need a Government that will look after the people of the UK and not sell every thing to overseas.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
